attributes.action: Give children in schools what they want
attributes.additional_details:
I am a student at harris crystal palace in year nine and i feel in the middle of double lessons, children should be able to have a ten or fifteen minute break.
Childer should also have a longer lunch and break by fifteen minutes.
Each week children should get fifteen pounds a week because of schools recently wanting us to buy the homework for three pounds that they are supposed to be giving us, if we don't we get sanctioned.
this would also be good because quite alot of children dont have lunch and with the money they can buy lunch.
Please help us in this matter, I already have alot of people in my school that agrees with me on this point.
Thank you.
